title: Product Support Specialist
responsibilities: Provide exceptional support and assistance to users of ClassLink's educational technology platform, ensuring efficient resolution of issues and inquiries.

Collaborate with development and technical teams to escalate and resolve complex technical issues. Monitor system performance and provide feedback for improvements, ensuring optimal user experience.

title: Activity Specialist
responsibilities: Managed a class of 5-10 students ranging from K-8, overseeing their tutoring in core subjects, homework completion, and organizing weekly STEM and arts activities to enrich their learning.

title: Beauty Consultant
